Action.author: joshhus
Action.body: Talked to Clayton ... Tasks are okay to be at different levels/scopes.

Action.body: Next steps are to split this up into sub-tasks, and update the v1 Hyperledger Fabric doc for each sub-task.

Action.body: Note: marking this as a security issue because the information in the attachments should not have been made public.
